requirements.summary: Add a visible “Buy” navigation item that routes to /products on both desktop and mobile for authenticated and unauthenticated users.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop header shows a “Buy” navigation item that routes to “/products”.
Mobile navigation provides a visible “Buy” entry point that routes to “/products” (either in the left menu, the quick-links row, or both).
The “Buy” entry is visible even when the user is not signed in.
All user-facing text added/updated for this change is in English.
No existing routes are removed or renamed; “/products” remains the shopping destination.

file_operations.description: Update the main header navigation to include a clearly labeled “Buy” link that routes to "/products" and is always rendered (not gated by authentication) for desktop and mobile. Ensure mobile includes the “Buy” entry point in the left Sheet menu and/or the Quick Links row. Use existing composed shadcn/ui components (e.g., Button/Sheet/Link) without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
